DOC.brief_title: The Twin Birth Study : A Trial Comparing Planned Vaginal Birth Elective Caesarean Section Twins
DOC.detailed_description: For twin pregnancy 32-38 week gestation , twin A present cephalic , policy plan CS decrease likelihood perinatal neonatal mortality serious neonatal morbidity , first 28 day birth , compare policy plan VB ?
DOC.criteria: 1 . Women 32 0/7 38 6/7 week gestation 2 . Estimated fetal weight fetus 1500 4000 g 3 . Both twin alive time randomization 4 . Twin A cephalic position 1 . Monoamniotic twin 2 . Lethal fetal anomaly either fetus 3 . Contraindication labour vaginal delivery either twin 4 . Previous participation Twin Birth Study
